params.blockHashes: Array of corresponding L1 block hashes
params.blockNumbers: Array of corresponding L1 block numbers

emergencyEnableExecution(bytes32).details: Only callable by owner in emergency situations

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

aztecExecutor().notice: Address of the Aztec executor contract

emergencyEnableExecution(bytes32).notice: Emergency function to manually enable execution for a will

isAuthorizedBridge(address).notice: Check if an address is an authorized bridge

isProcessed(bytes32).notice: Check if a will commitment has been processed

setBridgeAuthorization(address,bool).notice: Add or remove authorized bridge addresses
